author: bfoster
msg: - Converted crawling from recursion to iteration
- Several other modifications where made to Crawler and CrawlDaemon in respect to using Config
- all files are placed in the same directory and a .cas metadata file is started by filling it with RetrievedFromURI
- RenamingConvension interface was added so in the case that remove files are all named the same they can be temporarily renamed before downloaded to staging area.
- One RenamingConvension is currently implemented: HashPathWithoutNameRC.java
- this implementation takes the hashCode() of the directory path (that is, the remote path leading up to the file -- the file name is not included in the hash calculation).
- this is for in the case that the directory defines uniqueness."

author: bfoster
msg: - continued tweaking of new CommunicationMethod feature.

author: bfoster
msg: - Added a new CommunicationMethod that allowed for a cached db without RMI support. . .uses XMLRPC
- Modified FileRestrictions to use a Parser interface so that way more than just XML parsers could be used. . .currently there are now two parser implemented:
- email parser for IASI emails from CLASS

author: bfoster
msg: Ability to specify arguments to GenericFileManagerObjectFactory for the creation of CommunicationMethods
